Send a query to SFSQL.

Source: R/SFSQL.R
dbSendQuery-SFSQLConnection-method.Rd

Send a query to SFSQL.

# S4 method for SFSQLConnection
dbSendQuery(conn, statement, ...)

Arguments

conn

database connection, s created by dbConnect
statement

OGR SQL, see http://www.gdal.org/ogr_sql.html
...

for compatibility with generic

Examples

afile <- system.file("gpkg/nc.gpkg", package = "sf", mustWork = TRUE)
db <- dbConnect(SFSQL(), afile)
dbSendQuery(db, "SELECT * FROM \"nc.gpkg\" WHERE FID < 1")

#> Field names: fid, geom, AREA, PERIMETER, CNTY_, CNTY_ID, NAME, FIPS, FIPSNO, CRESS_ID, BIR74, SID74, NWBIR74, BIR79, SID79, NWBIR79

Contents

lazysf is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
